sage.physics.ODE4J

Class ODE4JUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.physics.ODE4J.ODE4JUtils

  • public class ODE4JUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class with static methods used in the ODE4J physics engine package.
    Author:
    Kyle

    • Method Detail

      • toDoubleArr

        public static double[] toDoubleArr(org.ode4j.math.DVector3C pos,
                                   org.ode4j.math.DMatrix3C rotation)
        Converts the position vector and rotation matrix into a Matrix3D formatted double array. That is, this method constructs a Matrix3D containing the specified position (translation) and rotation values, and returns an array produced by calling Matrix3D.getValues().
        Parameters:
        pos -
        rotation -
        Returns:
        an array of doubles corresponding to the specified position and rotation values

      • parsePosVec

        public static org.ode4j.math.DVector3 parsePosVec(double[] transform)
        Parses the position vector out of the double array transform. That is, this method constructs a Matrix3D using the specified array, then extracts column 3 (the translation) from the resulting Matrix3D and returns the resulting values.
        Parameters:
        transform -
        Returns:
        a DVector containing the translation values in the specified transform

      • parseRotationMat

        public static org.ode4j.math.DMatrix3 parseRotationMat(double[] transform)
        Parses the rotation matrix out of the double array transform. That is, this method constructs a Matrix3D from the specified transform array, then constructs a new DMatrix3 filled with the rotation values from the new Matrix3D.
        Parameters:
        transform -
        Returns:
        a DMatrix3 containing the rotation component of the specified transform
